content.rendered:
A snug, form-fitting beanie. It’s not only a great head-warming piece but a staple accessory in anyone’s wardrobe.

• 100% Turbo Acrylic
• 12? (30 cm) in length
• Hypoallergenic
• Unisex style
• Hand washable
• Blank product sourced from Vietnam or Bangladesh
